name: mewgenics-cat-visualiser
description: Visualize Mewgenics cat relationships and attributes from .sav or JSON data directly in the browser.
author: WybeBosch

scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:js:fix && pnpm run lint:styles:fix && pnpm run lint:other:fix
scripts.lint:dry: pnpm run lint:js && pnpm run lint:styles && pnpm run lint:other
scripts.version-release: git add package.json pnpm-lock.yaml && node -e "const{spawnSync}=require('child_process');const v=require('./package.json').version;const r=spawnSync('git',['commit','-m','release: v'+v],{stdio:'inherit'});process.exit(r.status)"
scripts.patch: pnpm version patch --no-git-tag-version && pnpm run version-release
scripts.minor: pnpm version minor --no-git-tag-version && pnpm run version-release
scripts.major: pnpm version major --no-git-tag-version && pnpm run version-release
